headline: Tech Weekly Podcast: Juan Guerra on studentfunder.com
text: In this week's edition the Guardian's digital correspondent Jemima Kiss meets web entrepreneur Juan Guerra whose startup studentfunder.com is attempting to change how university education is funded and re-establish meritocracy in the international education market. Also Jemima meets Gary Swart, CEO of one of the leading online job sites oDesk, to discuss the growing importance of the remote worker and why this tech industry employment model is starting to spread into other industries. And we have a roundup of this week's big tech news stories, including the birth of a new kind of online avatar called Zoe (see the video here) and the changing of the guard at both the computer games company Electronic Arts and the UK chip designer ARM Holdings.
